p: This study investigated the antimicrobial activities and in vivo wound healing activities for three medicinal plants. Histological studies were performed on animalsâ€™ skin. Our study demonstrated that all tested plants have various antimicrobial and wound healing activities. But L. acacia exhibited the best antimicrobial and wound healing activities results in comparing with the reference drug. Thus, it is essential to consider L. acacia as a prospective source in progress in the synthesis of a new antimicrobial medicine in curing infectious diseases.
